title: Synthwave Sunset
description: A retro-futuristic theme with neon pinks and teals against a deep space backdrop
css: :root { --synthwave-bg: #0d1421; --synthwave-surface: #1a2332; --synthwave-accent: #ff006e; --synthwave-cyan: #00f5ff; --synthwave-purple: #7209b7; --synthwave-text: #e0e6ed; --synthwave-muted: #9ca3af; } body { background: var(--synthwave-bg) !important; color: var(--synthwave-text) !important; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; } .bg-white, [data-testid='thread-content'] { background: var(--synthwave-surface) !important; border: 1px solid var(--synthwave-purple); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 0, 110, 0.1); } .text-gray-900, .text-black { color: var(--synthwave-text) !important; } .text-gray-600, .text-gray-500 { color: var(--synthwave-muted) !important; } .border-gray-200, .border-gray-300 { border-color: var(--synthwave-purple) !important; } .hover\:bg-gray-50:hover, .hover\:bg-gray-100:hover { background: rgba(255, 0, 110, 0.1) !important; } a, .text-blue-600 { color: var(--synthwave-cyan) !important; text-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--synthwave-cyan); } button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--synthwave-accent), var(--synthwave-purple)) !important; color: white !important; border: none !important; text-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5); } button:hover { box-shadow: 0 0 15px var(--synthwave-accent); }

config.title: Synthwave Sunset
config.customCss: :root { --synthwave-bg: #0d1421; --synthwave-surface: #1a2332; --synthwave-accent: #ff006e; --synthwave-cyan: #00f5ff; --synthwave-purple: #7209b7; --synthwave-text: #e0e6ed; --synthwave-muted: #9ca3af; } body { background: var(--synthwave-bg) !important; color: var(--synthwave-text) !important; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; } .bg-white, [data-testid='thread-content'] { background: var(--synthwave-surface) !important; border: 1px solid var(--synthwave-purple); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 0, 110, 0.1); } .text-gray-900, .text-black { color: var(--synthwave-text) !important; } .text-gray-600, .text-gray-500 { color: var(--synthwave-muted) !important; } .border-gray-200, .border-gray-300 { border-color: var(--synthwave-purple) !important; } .hover\:bg-gray-50:hover, .hover\:bg-gray-100:hover { background: rgba(255, 0, 110, 0.1) !important; } a, .text-blue-600 { color: var(--synthwave-cyan) !important; text-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--synthwave-cyan); } button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--synthwave-accent), var(--synthwave-purple)) !important; color: white !important; border: none !important; text-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5); } button:hover { box-shadow: 0 0 15px var(--synthwave-accent); }
